description:
The one manipulating Ocoho was Mordred, but Mordred claims that Queen Boudica herself is a traitor with connections to a shady organization called the Faithful of the Hermit. Ocoho is left unsure what she should believe, but Seth`s advice helps her make a decision. On the day of the ordination ceremony, Ocoho exposes the truth and questions Queen Boudica in front of everyone, declaring that some of the knights are traitors.
Source: crunchyroll
